  • Constructor Details

    • GameInformation

      public GameInformation()
      Constructor for the game's information

  • Method Details

    • setFarm

      public void setFarm​(Farm playerFarm)
      Sets the value of the player's farm. Used only in the GUI implementation.
      Parameters:
      playerFarm - The player's farm, created using information on the set-up screen.

    • setRequiredDays

      public void setRequiredDays​(int desiredDays)
      Sets the desired amount of days for the player. Used only in the GUI implementation.
      Parameters:
      desiredDays - The amount of days the player wants to play for.

    • setNumActions

      public void setNumActions​(int number)
      Sets the number of actions permittable in a single day.
      Parameters:
      number - The number of actions that can be completed in one day.

    • setRandomEventsOn

      public void setRandomEventsOn​(boolean accept)
      Sets whether the random events occur during gameplay or not.
      Parameters:
      accept - true if random events will occur.

    • setDecreaseHappinessDays

      public void setDecreaseHappinessDays​(int days)
      Sets the amount of days until animal happiness decreases.
      Parameters:
      days - The required days until a decrease in happiness.

    • addOneDay

      public void addOneDay()
      Adds one day to the current day counter.

    • changeNumActions

      public void changeNumActions()
      Subtracts one from the current value of numActions. Used when a daily activity is performed.

    • getStore

      public Store getStore()
      Returns the store object.
      Returns:
      store The store object.

    • getNumActions

      public int getNumActions()
      Returns the current value of numActions.
      Returns:
      numActions The number of actions left in the day.

    • getCurrentDays

      public int getCurrentDays()
      Returns the number of days currently surpassed.
      Returns:
      currentDays The number of days the game has gone for so far.

    • getRequiredDays

      public int getRequiredDays()
      Returns the number of days the game must continue for.
      Returns:
      requiredDays The number of days the player wanted the game to go for.

    • getFarm

      public Farm getFarm()
      Returns the player's farm object.
      Returns:
      farm The player's farm.

    • getRandomEventsOn

      public boolean getRandomEventsOn()
      Returns whether the random events are turned on for the game.
      Returns:
      randomEventsOn true if random events are enabled.

    • getDecreaseHappinessDays

      public int getDecreaseHappinessDays()
      Returns the number of days left until animal happiness decreases.
      Returns:
      decreaseHappinessDays Days until animals lose happiness.
